Predict

Do you want to know if staff members are susceptible to stress? Or indeed if they are at risk of feeling considerable job dissatisfaction?

Answer Dr De Stress’ questions about your staff and let him tell you if you need to act. Reduce staff sick days and turnover costs by making the people you have feel better at work.

stressfri

Stressfri is an AI-powered platform to help you capture early signs of stress in your staff and put in the right measures to tackle it.
